content:
The thrill of a close game! It sounds like it was a nail-biter, and that lucky move at the end must have been exhilarating!

Blocking is a crucial part of Ticket to Ride, and it's great that Mike was paying attention to your moves and trying to disrupt your plans. It's always satisfying to outmaneuver your opponent, especially when it comes down to the wire.

That lucky move might have been a turning point in the game, but it's also a testament to your adaptability and ability to think on your feet. Did you have a plan B in case Mike had blocked you, or was it more of a "go with the flow" moment?

And how did Mike take the loss? Was he gracious in defeat, or is he already plotting his revenge for the next game?
